title: Kylie Jenner puts edited Tyga tattoo on show after denying hook up
text:
Kylie Jenner flaunts amended Tyga tattoo (Picture: @KylieJenner / GC Images)

Kylie Jenner has flaunted her amended Tyga tattoo after furiously denying claims she went on a ‘2am date’ with the rapper following her split from Travis Scott.

During her relationship with Tyga, the beauty mogul got the letter ‘T’ romantically inked onto her ankle.

However, since parting ways back in 2017, the 22-year-old made sure she update the tat to read ‘LA’ as a nod to her hometown.

Now, just days after separating from Travis, the mother-of-one made sure the ink was on full display as she posed in her Adidas outfit on Instagram.

And it didn’t go unnoticed by her followers, as someone was quick to comment: ‘She’s showing Tygas tat..’ while others obsessed over her wardrobe.

She denied going on a date with her ex-beau (Picture: @kyliejenner)

The star’s tat previously read T (Picture: AKM-GSI-XPOSURE)

The picture comes just hours after she profusely denied seeing Tyga when pictured arriving at his studio earlier this week.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Taking to Twitter, the reality star insisted: ‘The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

‘There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.’

She went onto address her one-year-old baby Stormi, who she shares with Trav, adding: ‘Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority.’

She and Travis are putting their daughter Stormi first (Picture: Getty Images)

And it sure sounds like they’re putting their little one first, as it was recently claimed the duo will be co-parenting the tot.

An insider told People magazine: ‘They have split for now and are living apart. Travis moved out a couple of weeks ago and lives at his own house. Stormi will continue to live with Kylie.

‘They are both great parent and will co-parent. They don’t want their split to affect Stormi too much.

‘As soon as they felt they couldn’t figure out their issues, they decided to separate so their disagreements won’t affect Stormi.’

Kylie reportedly wanted to have another baby with Travis before their shock split, but sources claim she had ‘trust issues’ within their relationship.

Advertisement

Advertisement

According to the source close to the businesswoman, the two ‘have some trust issues but their problems have stemmed more from the stress of their lifestyles.’

description: Kylie Jenner puts edited Tyga tattoo on show after furiously denying late night hook up following Travis Scott shock split.
